meanings.definition: Able to be picked or chosen.
meanings.sent1: The ripe apples on the tree were very pickable.
meanings.sent2: The store had a variety of pickable fruits and vegetables.
meanings.sent3: The pickable flowers in the garden seemed to wave hello.
meanings.sent4: The pickable opportunities in life are like hidden treasures waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The bright, pickable colors of the candies made them irresistible to the children.

meanings.sent1: The soft fabric was very pickable for making a cozy blanket.
meanings.sent2: The menu had many pickable options for dinner.
meanings.sent3: The pickable outfits in the store made it hard to choose just one.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like pickable flowers, delicate and carefully chosen.
meanings.sent5: The pickable ingredients in the recipe added a burst of flavor to the dish.
